definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
the New World/the Americas as opposed to the Old World 舊大陸|旧大陆[jiu4 da4 lu4] or Eurasia
Eurasian land bridge (rail line linking China and Europe)
Eurasian hinterland (i.e. Central Asia including Xinjiang)
pinyin: Ya4 ou1 da4 lu4 fu4 di4

definition: (in Taiwan, Hong Kong or Macao) girl from the mainland/(Tw) Fushan lettuce 福山萵苣|福山莴苣[Fu2 shan1 wo1 ju4]

sentences.english: Chinese mainland part of the film and television industry friends want to shoot some students in my class.
sentences.chinese: 中国大陆几个影视界的朋友想让我班部分同学拍戏。

sentences.english: We're looking forward to doing the same here in China.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在中国大陆的网聚也能有这种良好互动。

sentences.english: Which continent produces the most cocoa?
sentences.chinese: 哪一个大陆生产了大部份的可可亚？

sentences.english: America is the country that helped liberate a continent from the march of a madman.
sentences.chinese: 美国曾帮助把一个大陆从一个狂人的铁蹄下解放出来。

sentences.english: Only by being open and inclusive can a country prosper and can our continent prosper.
sentences.chinese: 只有开放兼容，国家才能富强，亚欧大陆才能兴旺。

sentences.english: They hoped to obtain exit visas here and escaped to the New World At first, Rick can't forgive that Ilsa's gone back on[3] her word.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望能在这里得到出境证后逃离到美洲新大陆去。

sentences.english: In addition there is a notable shortage of traffic police in mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还有一个显着短缺，交通警在大陆。

sentences.english: Africa is maybe the most beautiful continent in the world.
sentences.chinese: 非洲可能是这个世界上最美丽的大陆了。

sentences.english: Massive segments or plates of the crust move over the mantle in the process of continental drift.
sentences.chinese: 大陆漂移雕塑了地壳的外观，使现在大陆形成。

sentences.english: Massive segments or plates of the crust move over the mantle in the process of continental drift.
sentences.chinese: 大陆漂移雕塑了地壳的外观，使现在大陆形成。

sentences.english: Soul of a force on the storm, swept the continent magic peak.
sentences.chinese: 一切关于魂力的风暴，席卷大陆的幻术巅峰。

sentences.english: Each settlement of the Pilgrims was a little piece of the Old World inserted into the New.
sentences.chinese: 每一处清教徒的居留地，都是嵌进新大陆的旧世界。

sentences.english: If your using the continental grip, your toss will be slightly over the left shoulder if your right handed.
sentences.chinese: 如果你用大陆式握拍，你的抛球应该稍稍过左肩。

sentences.english: People used to give credit Columbus for the discovery of the New Continent.
sentences.chinese: 人们过去把发现新大陆的功劳归之于哥伦布。

sentences.english: Then he was profiled by the mainland's print media in both Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 然后大陆的中英文平面媒体报导了他。

definition: variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau (media term used esp. since 1997)
mainland China (PRC excluding Hong Kong and Macau, but including islands such as Hainan)/Japan (used in Taiwan during Japanese colonization)
the Old World/Eurasia as opposed to the New World 新大陸|新大陆[xin1 da4 lu4] or the Americas
